1775590465317818582.text: what is the darker zelda game?  majora's mask  or   twilight princess
replies: why not take both?
every zelda game could be "the darkest" its a meaningless and entirely subjective label.
majoras mask, its more sinister and with theories like link being dead etc it just add to the darkness
majoras mask, and its not even close.

twilight princess is dark and gritty majora's mask is melancolic and sad, it makes you think about life, death, time, who you would want to spend the last days of your life, and motivates you to seek happiness so obviously tp, that game is so dark you can't see anything at times

majoras mask. it dealt with a lot of heavy topics head on like fear of death, loss, and fear of the end in ways that a lot of mature games dont do well. a beautiful look into the depressing side of reality and how you would react to impending doom and all the sadness involved
doesn't matter, uncle ben. game of thrones season 8 episode 3 is darker than both.  (jokes aside, mm by a mile. or 72 hours)

majora's mask is dark because of the major themes of grief and despair surrounding its world  twilight princess is dark for the atmosphere and overall tone of the story and characters  majora's mask imo is the darker of the two, but they both have their own unique strengths.
